resources.string: The request took too long to complete. Please try again.
Oops, it seems like your quota is exceeded.
Couldn't connect to server, please check your internet connection.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
No account found with this email address
Too many requests. Please try again later.
Email not verified! Please verify your email.
Please enter a valid email address
Password must include at least one lowercase letter
Password must include at least one uppercase letter
Password must include at least one number
Password must include at least one special character
Password must be at least 8 characters long
Password must be 64 characters or less
Operation not allowed. Please contact support.
This account exists with a different sign-in method. Please use the appropriate method to sign in.
This credential is already in use by another account. Please try a different one.
The provided email or password is incorrect. Please try again.
This user account has been disabled. Please contact support for assistance.
Please sign out and sign back in to continue.
We've sent a verification link to your email. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify.
We encountered an unexpected issue. Please try again or contact support.
Your email has been successfully verified!
Enter your email to reset your password
We've sent a password reset link to:
Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
Invalid authentication. Please sign in again.
Please sign in to perform this action.
Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
Too many requests. Please try again later.
This operation is not allowed from this domain.
The provided profile picture URL is invalid.
Name is too long. Please use a shorter name.
Name is too short. Please use a longer name.
Name can only contain letters, digits, and spaces
We couldn't find the file. Please check the file path and try again.
There was an issue accessing the file. Please try again.
The selected file is not a valid image. Please choose a different file.
We encountered an error while compressing the image. Please try again.
Camera permission denied. Please enable it in settings.
Gallery permission denied. Please enable it in settings.
Permissions denied. Please enable them in settings.
Google sign-in failed, no credential found.
Account not found. Please check your credentials or create a new account.
Ensure you have an existing account with that email address in other to receive the reset link!
Are you sure you want to sign out of your account?
This will permanently delete your account.\nAll your data will be removed and cannot be recovered.
Error occurred while Re-authenticating, if it persists please contact support
For your security, please re-authenticate with Google to continue with this action.
For your security, please enter your password to continue with this action.
Please confirm your password to delete your account
Oops, it seems like your storage is full.
Operation was cancelled. Please try again.
Invalid input provided. Please check your data and try again.
The request timed out. Please try again.
You do not have permission to perform this action.
Request limit exceeded. Please try again later.
The operation cannot be completed due to the current system state.
A value is out of the allowed range.
An internal error occurred. Please try again later.
Service is currently unavailable. Please try again soon.
Data loss occurred. Please contact support if the problem persists.
Authentication failed. Please check your network connection and try again.
I'm currently experiencing high demand. Please try again in a moment.
I couldn't process that request. Please try asking in a different way.
I'm having trouble connecting to my services right now. Please try again later.
Image generation failed. Please try again later
Tap the + button below to start your first conversation
Oops! We couldn’t find the item you’re looking for.
Hmm, it seems the storage bucket doesn’t exist.
We couldn’t locate the project. Let’s double-check the details.
It looks like we’ve tried too many times. Please wait a moment and try again.
Something’s not right with the file. Please check and try again.
The operation was canceled. Let us know if you need help restarting it.
We ran into a technical issue. Please try again in a bit.
Select a chat from the list to view the conversation
Message is too long. Please shorten your message.
Describe the image you want to generate
Error saving image, please try again.
Microphone permission is required for audio recording
